title: WATCH: Latvia makes its debut at the United Nations Security Council
summary_full: With much advance fanfare, Latvia took its place for the first time ever as a temporary member of the United Nations Security Council (UNSC) on January 1st – but would probably not have expected that within a few days it would be a voice discussing a major new international crisis.
